jobDescription: Responsibilities: · Under the direction of the physical therapist, implements specific medically prescribed physical therapy programs for individual patients to restore function and prevent disability.  · Documents the case appropriately for all pediatric, adult, and geriatric patients.  · Assists in performing treatment as developed and directed by the physical therapist  · Maintains and completes documentation, department records and reports and contributes to the efficient productive operation of the therapy unit. Requirements: · Graduate of an accredited Physical Therapy Assistant Program required.  · Must be licensed in the state of Michigan.  · Must have interpersonal skills sufficient to interact with patients, visitors and associates.
